extendedInfo.description: Access Albany Public Library from your mobile device!Use APL Mobile to search the catalog, place items on hold, renew materials, access our downloadable collection of ebooks and audiobooks, manage your library account, find locations and hours of our seven neighborhood libraries in Albany (NY), check out our calendar of events, ask us a question, and connect with us on Facebook and Twitter.APL Mobile includes a great new way to search our books. No need to search by field, enter full words, or wait for results. Just type the first couple of letters of the key words and see the search in action while you type. For example, to find books on "Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis" simply type "ja ke on".Another great feature of APL Mobile is Book Look. Simply scan the bar code on any book and find out if we have it at the library. Then you can request it right from the app.Have 24/7 access to Albany Public Library at your fingertips with APL Mobile!

reviews.title: Please fix!
reviews.comment: App keeps forcing close when you attempt to download digital books already checked out.
reviews.author: nik phil

reviews.title: Impressed
reviews.comment: So far so good. Like the renewing feature, very easy to do. Keep adding features!
reviews.author: Thao Nguyen

reviews.title: DROID RAZR
reviews.comment: Works gd. Search engine could be better. Would like to be able to request from a specific library.  Like the ease to see what is due. Has room for improvement but overall an effective application for people that are a part of this library system.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Easy to use, works smoothly, features are what I\'d want to see. Good job APL (esp deanna! )
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: It kinda sucks but gets the job done quicker
reviews.author: A Google User
